system.damageOrEffect: Grants weapon Cleansing Fire and Sanctified Quality. If a psyker is shot by this ammo they auto-fail Cleansing Fire Quality Test with 1d5 DoF, and takes 1d10 Damage if trying to use a Psychic Technique while on fire this way (ignores Armour/Toughness).

description.value:
Damage/Effect: Grants weapon Cleansing Fire and Sanctified Quality. If a psyker is shot by this ammo they auto-fail Cleansing Fire Quality Test with 1d5 DoF, and takes 1d10 Damage if trying to use a Psychic Technique while on fire this way (ignores Armour/Toughness).

Qualities: Cleansing Fire, Sanctified
